law.catch_line: Grounds for denial, revocation, or suspension -- Civil penalty.

text.section: The board shall revoke the license of an architect who practices architecture while his license is suspended.

The board may, in lieu of or in addition to other penalties, impose a civil penalty not to exceed ten thousand dollars ($10,000), which shall be paid to the benefit of the board's trust and agency account.
